template.name: o_assets_backend
template.value: <!-- For use in backend --> <template id="assets_backend" name="$module_name$ assets" inherit_id="web.assets_backend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link href="/$module_name$/static/src/css/$css_name$" rel="stylesheet"/> <script src="/$module_name$/static/src/js/$js_name$" type="text/javascript"/> </xpath> </template>

template.name: odoo_resources
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <odoo> <data> <!-- For use in backend --> <template id="assets_backend" name="$module_name assets" inherit_id="web.assets_backend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link href="/$module_name/static/src/css/$css_name" rel="stylesheet"/> <script src="/$module_name/static/src/js/$js_name" type="text/javascript"/> </xpath> </template>
<!-- For use in report --> <template id="assets_common" name="$module_name pdf assets" inherit_id="report.assets_common"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link href="/$module_name/static/src/css/$css_name" rel="stylesheet"/> </xpath> </template>
<!-- For use in POS --> <template id="assets" name="$module_name assets" inherit_id="point_of_sale.assets"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link href="/$module_name/static/src/css/$css_name" rel="stylesheet" /> <script src="/$module_name/static/src/js/$js_name" type="text/javascript"/> </xpath> </template>
<!-- For use in website --> <template id="assets_frontend" name="$module_name assets frontend" inherit_id="website.assets_frontend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link href='/$module_name/static/src/css/$css_name' rel='stylesheet'/> <script src="/$module_name/static/src/js/$js_name" type="text/javascript"/> </xpath> </template> </data> </odoo>

template.name: o_assets_common
template.value: <!-- For use in report --> <template id="assets_common" name="$module_name$ pdf assets" inherit_id="report.assets_common"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link href="/$module_name$/static/src/css/$css_name$" rel="stylesheet"/> </xpath> </template>

template.name: o_assets_pos
template.value: <!-- For use in POS --> <template id="assets" name="$module_name$ assets" inherit_id="point_of_sale.assets"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link href="/$module_name$/static/src/css/$css_name$" rel="stylesheet"/> <script src="/$module_name$/static/src/js/$js_name$" type="text/javascript"/> </xpath> </template>

template.name: o_assets_frontend
template.value: <!-- For use in website --> <template id="assets_frontend" name="$module_name$ assets frontend" inherit_id="website.assets_frontend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link href='/$module_name$/static/src/css/$css_name$' rel='stylesheet'/> <script src="/$module_name$/static/src/js/$js_name$" type="text/javascript"/> </xpath> </template>

template.name: o_view_xpath
template.value: <record id="$record_id$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$template_name$</field> <field name="model">$model$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$inherit_id$"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <xpath expr="$expr$" position="$position$"> $END$ </xpath> </field> </record>

template.name: o_view_form
template.value: <record id="$record_id$_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$record_name$</field> <field name="model">$model$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="$form_string$"> <sheet> $END$ </sheet> </form> </field> </record>

template.name: o_view_tree
template.value: <record id="$record_id$_tree" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$record_name$</field> <field name="model">$model$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="$tree_string$"> $END$ </tree> </field> </record>

template.name: o_menuitem_top
template.value: <!-- Top menu item --> <menuitem id="$id$" name="$name$" groups="$groups$" icon="$icon$" web_icon="$web_icon$" sequence="$sequence$"/>

template.name: o_menuitem
template.value: <!-- menu item --> <menuitem id="$id$" name="$name$" parent="$parent$" action="$action$" groups="$groups$" sequence="$sequence$"/>
